name: NEKODEFENSE
description:
NEKODEFENSE
INTRO
A game of cats and lizards that will be a tower defense defense against lizards.
HOW TO PLAY
Players must plan and use limited resources to buy cats to fight the lizards by clicking and dropping them in the empty spaces. To get the cat down to fight and protect the house from the invasion of the lizards.
Subject : GI344

Supervised by
